Plot: A documentary that follows a billionaire couple as they begin construction on a mansion inspired by Versailles. During the next two years, their empire, fueled by the real estate bubble and cheap money, falters due to the economic crisis.
Title: The Queen of Versailles
Actors: Lorraine Barrett, June Downs, Phillip Froehlich, Marissa Gaspay
tomatoConsensus: The Queen of Versailles is a timely, engaging, and richly drawn portrait of the American Dream improbably composed of equal parts compassion and schadenfreude.
